author: Staff Reporter
text:
Registrations are open for the 16th edition of The Hindu Young World Quiz to be held in Madurai on January 25 in collaboration with VIT University.

The quiz, which will be a team event with two members per team, is open for school students studying from Classes 4 to 9.

Those interested in registering for the quiz can either visit the website www.thehindu.com/ywquiz or contact S.R. Prasath on the numbers 9585506050 or 04522528497.

The registration fee will be Rs. 200 for a team. Students taking part in the quiz will have a written preliminary test based on which the top six teams will be selected for the on-stage final.

The venue for the competition is Thiagarajar College near Teppakulam in Madurai. The competition for juniors category (Class 4 to Class 6) will be held at 10 a.m. while for the seniors (Class 7 to Class 9), it will be at 2 p.m.

Exciting prizes are up for grabs in the quiz competition, which is organised in collaboration with Firefox, Kokuyo Camlin and Ars-HTA.
title: Registration open for The Hindu Young World Quiz
